name: Back Seat Tales
description:
“I’m getting out of here!”
“Like out of the city?”
“No, I wanna get off this planet!”
“...  That’s gonna be a pricey taxi ride, you know that?”

You are a taxi driver bringing people to the moon who share a bit about their life with you. 

Controls

Move around with WASD/arrow keys.
Press the in-game pause button or space to pause the game.
Change the pace of the game with the slider on the bottom right.

Collect the dialogue boxes to progress with the story
and avoid obstacles to not lose time on your way to the moon.

Credits

Gamejam Team

Sadie Jarvis: Narrative Design, Game Design
Anas Pomelova: Programming, Game Design
Alice Lai: Programming
Daniel Kam: Art
Amanda Stevens: Sound Design

Voice Cast

Steven Downton: Take
Super Pretzel Punch: Father
Sadie Jarvis: PC
